document_data.name: Castle Dasaajk
document_data.mainbody: '''Castle Dasaajk''' was a castle situated on the eastern edge of the [[Purple Hills]] in [[Tethyr]].
document_data.History:
In the 3rd and 4th centuries [[DR]], the location was the site of a fortress and the base of the [[Holy Warriors of Suffering]], a [[paladin]] order devoted to [[Ilmater]].

By [[1374 DR]], the site was occupied by Castle Dasaajk.

In the [[841 DR|Year of the Hunted Elk, 841 DR]], King [[Samyte]] of [[Tethyr]] was assassinated in Castle Dasaajk by [[Uthaedeol|Uthaedeol the Blooddrenched]], a priest of [[Bhaal]], along with his sons.
